caption: Table 1: Experimental results for the Dictator (D), Ultimatum Proposer (UP), and Responder (UR) games. Arrows denote the direction of the emotional effect. The blue color shows models' alignment with human behavior in terms of similar relative changes under emotions.
description: This table presents the experimental findings on how different LLMs respond in the Dictator and Ultimatum games under various emotional states.  It shows the average proposed offer share and acceptance rate for each LLM across multiple runs and different emotional prompts (anger, disgust, fear, happiness, sadness) and compares these results with human benchmarks. The blue coloring highlights the degree of alignment between LLM responses and human behavior in terms of relative changes in the metrics under various emotional conditions.
